name: eset-protect-enterprise
label: ESET Protect Enterprise
description: ESET Protect Enterprise extended detection and response (XDR) that delivers enterprise-grade visibility, threat hunting and response options.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: base_url
fields.description: URL for the ESET Enterprise server from where the connector gets notifications.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: server_username
fields.description: Username to access the ESET Enterprise server.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: server_password
fields.description: Password to access the ESET Enterprise server.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Executables List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all the executables from ESET.

parameters.title: Application Management URL
parameters.name: server_url
parameters.description: Specify the server URL for Application Management.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the server URL for Application Management.

parameters.title: Executable UUID
parameters.name: executableUuid
parameters.description: Specify the Executable UUID to get the details from ESET Server.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Executable UUID to get the details from ESET Server.

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Specify the page size for pagination purpose. Maximum value can be 2147483647
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page size for pagination purpose. Maximum value can be 2147483647

parameters.title: Page Token
parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Specify the page token of current page. If not given the first page is returned.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page token of current page. If not given the first page is returned.

operations.title: Get Device Tasks List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all device tasks.

parameters.description: Specify the server URL for Automation.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the server URL for Automation.

parameters.title: Task UUID
parameters.name: task_uuid

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.name: pageSize

operations.title: Get Detections List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all the detections.

parameters.title: Incident Management URL
parameters.name: server_url
parameters.description: Specify the server URL for Incident Management.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the server URL for Incident Management.

parameters.title: Detection UUID
parameters.name: detectionUuid
parameters.description: Specify the Detection UUID to get the details from ESET Server.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Detection UUID to get the details from ESET Server.

parameters.title: Device UUID
parameters.name: deviceUuid
parameters.description: Specify the Device UUID to get detections those are linked with the provided device.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Device UUID to get detections those are linked with the provided device.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Specify the start time for include only incidents whose detections occurred after start time.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the start time for include only incidents whose detections occurred after start time.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: Specify the end time for include only incidents whose detections occurred before end time.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the end time for include only incidents whose detections occurred before end time.

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Specify the page size for pagination purpose. Maximum value can be 2147483647
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page size for pagination purpose. Maximum value can be 2147483647

parameters.title: Page Token
parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Specify the page token of current page. If not given the first page is returned.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the page token of current page. If not given the first page is returned.
